history.content: I’ve spoken with my advisor about this, as I Intern during the semester regularly, there is a form you can fill out. While I’ve never actually gone through the process for it, as I have enough units, I believe it’s run by Professor Hilfinger. Definitely check with your advisor.

Hi, I was reading https://career.berkeley.edu/Internships/IntAcad and it gave me some idea, but it also says a lot of it depends on the department. So for EECS department, how possible (easy?) is it to get units for internship during semester?

According to this, 

"Often your internship must relate directly to your major and will require you to complete a substantial research project or writing component as part of special studies course."

Does it work if it is not research internship, but rather software engineering type of internship. Thanks.
history.subject: How to get units for internship during semester?
